name: Mango Peach Smoothie
description: This is an unbelievably delicious smoothie!

ingredients.ingredient: fresh or frozen strawberries or raspberries
unsweetened non-dairy milk such as almond or soy milk

directions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Pour into a glass and enjoy!
This recipe was adapted from this excellent version here:  https://www.bestofthislife.com/2014/01/mango-hurricane-smoothie.html
